I am Bernard Nongpoh, a Security Engineer at Qualcomm, Hyderabad. Previously I was a Post Doctorate Researcher at CEA LIST, University of Paris, Saclay, France 🇫🇷 where I was a member of the BINSEC Team headed by Sébastien Bardin and supervised by Michaël Marcozzi. I completed my Ph.D from National Institute of Technology Meghalaya under the guidance of Dr. Rajarshi Ray and Dr. Ansuman Banerjee. Check out my Ph.D Thesis in Approximate Computing.

  • My hometown is from Meghalaya, India 🇮🇳.
  • Check these photos if you would like to visit Meghalaya.
